English: fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers

q: `明~．`湯顯祖~《`牡丹亭~．`第一~○`齣~》：「`原來~`奼紫嫣紅~`開~`遍~，`似~`這般~`都~`付與~`斷井頹垣~。」
d.s: `花團錦簇~,`五彩繽紛~,`萬紫千紅~

English: fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
francais: une orgie de pourpre admirable et de cramoisi tendre
